attributes.action: to save All Saints Day Care Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ALL SAINTS IS THE ONLY CENTRE FOR PHYSICALLY DISABLED PEOPLE IN MERTON
IT HAS BEEN RUNNING FOR OVER 25 YEARS
THE COUNCIL WANT TO CHANGE IT OR PULL IT DOWN 
THE MEMBERS THAT USE IT PROVIDES THEM WITH A SOCIAL LIFE THE ONLY  TIME THEY GO OUT IS TO ALL SAINTS

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
